attributes.action: Increase all MPs pay by 100 percent & abolish MPs making claims for all expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By increasing MPs pay this would bring them into line with employees in the private sector of equal standing, the abolishment of expense claims would also bring them into line with the private sector and give them a clearer understanding of the impact of direct and indirect tax increases on the electorate.
